title: Control the Elder Brain
content:
fect. We should stay in the city. Help to rebuild it. Let's get out of this godforsaken city. I hear amn is lovely this time of year. I think it's we part ways.

Choosing dialogue 1 will show that everyone agrees to this, Astarion leaves to find shade as he burns under sunlight.

How to unlock Control the Elder Brain

Dominate the Elder Brain is a subquest of Confront the Elder Brain.
